author: Larry Denis
description: Your choice of whisky and bitters (I use Bob's Abbotts) will make or break this potentially brilliant whisky sour. Maple syrup should be in more sours.
name: Habitant
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
